comment.author: 27779106@N02
comment._content: Wow, this one is really damaged  but the subject can still be seen with a decent amount of detail. Congratulations on your efforts to keep this photographer's work alive.

comment.author: 109550159@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/27779106@N02] Yeah, lot of dirt and… (I forgot the word) chicken shit. Beside that the emulsion is cracked and detached from glass — i couldn't clean it more without damaging even further. Quite frustrating…

comment.author: 93381432@N07
comment._content: Strange M1927 officer's uniform (although he seems to be a corporal). I believe the photographed is the same person as the right one in this photo: www.flickr.com/photos/costicaacsinte/11011410783/
